query: What was my Erythrocyte distribution width on July 7, 2020, and how does it relate to my overall health?
resource_summaries:
This is an observation record for a laboratory test measuring Erythrocyte distribution width, taken on July 7, 2020, with a value of 40.294 fL.
This record is an observation of the patient's erythrocyte distribution width, taken in a laboratory setting on July 7, 2020, with a value of 40.294 fL.
answer: Your Erythrocyte distribution width on July 7, 2020, was 40.294 fL. Erythrocyte distribution width is a measure of the variation in the size of your red blood cells. A higher or lower than normal value can indicate certain health conditions such as anemia, nutritional deficiencies, or chronic diseases. It is important to discuss this result with your healthcare provider to determine its significance in relation to your overall health.
